title: [Western DragonSpine, Slope]
description: A thick mist envelopes the mountainside just below this narrow ledge.  Wisps of the mist rise up on the steady breeze, drifting slowly through the air before dissipating.  The dry air pushes gritty, loose dirt across the now smooth, rocky mountainside.
location: between Wehnimer's Landing and Zul Logoth
